name: Blue Cinex
description: Blue Cinex is the stimulating love child of Blue Dream and Cinex. This creeper lays into the mind from the first puff and expands outward within 15 minutes after inhalation. Offering longevity and potency, Blue Cinex is a perfect partner for long days on your feet or sustained physical activity. With a haziness that fills the mind and a physical stimulation that will get you talking, this strain will work as hard as you do.
descriptionPlain: Blue Cinex is the stimulating love child of Blue Dream and Cinex. This creeper lays into the mind from the first puff and expands outward within 15 minutes after inhalation. Offering longevity and potency, Blue Cinex is a perfect partner for long days on your feet or sustained physical activity. With a haziness that fills the mind and a physical stimulation that will get you talking, this strain will work as hard as you do.

highlightedReviews.text: Love Blue Cinex. Love it more than Cinderella's Dream. It keeps you upbeat and uplifted without being racy or anxiety producing at all. That does mean that the come down leans toward sleepy, but for me, it's more like... coming home from the beach. Relaxed, maybe a bit yawny but definitely not sleepy... just blissfully chill.

What can blue do for you? 
I read it was a creeper, and like most of us, know the parents very well. So I decided to go out on a limb and hit it like I've smoked it for a while and throw first time caution into the wind.
It smells like meh. If you give any random stoner a whiff, they will say meh.
Inhale was 10/10 smooth, and that surprised me. Exhale sweet and a possible berry note.
This burns very well also. (Smokey Point) Possibly too well? Is that even a thing?
5 min in, feeling zero head, but feels like an angel with nice hands is rubbing my shoulders.
Just a minutes later, realized my spirits seem lifted to a nice all is right in the world feeling.
Slight neck and spine @ 10 min in, with head an every so slight haze that replaced a clear head... but now they seem in battle.
I've reached the climax right at 15 min. Wow, they were spot on.
I do have the slight haze now, but still could function @ 100% even in a place of work.
This is a very chill high, and really loving it. Concept of time still there. This is going into my rotation for sure. Zero bad effects. This would be great for someone with flower anxiety for sure.
4.5/5 stars (I'm picky about heaviness in my neck area, color me strange)
